nodes.text: The Obran Cluster was an asteroid cluster where the Rebel Alliance had hidden cargo storage containers full of warheads. However, the Imperials learned of the cargo containers and placed a mine field at the location, intending to lure the rebels into an ambush to inflict losses and acquire warheads at the same time. Despite the minefield and Imperial Assault Gunboats lying in wait for an ambush, which the rebels were fully aware of, the rebels sent A-wings to remove the mine-field and attempted to hold off the imperial forces long enough for their Heavy Lifters of flight group Beetle to pick up the containers.
The outcome depends on which side the player takes.
